Transaction State Context.Wager State: When users place a bet by calling the wager function.
Transaction State Context.Play State: When users trigger the play function to determine the result of their bet.
Transaction State Context.Donation State: When users call the donate function to transfer funds directly to the whale address.

External Interactions.ETH Transfer to Whale: ETH is transferred to the whale address when users lose or donate.
External Interactions.ETH Transfer to Winner: ETH is transferred to the winning player when the play function determines they have won.
External Interactions.ERC20 Token Transfer: A function is included to transfer any ERC20 tokens sent to the contract accidentally.
